#summary Defines which compiler types are to be used for which file types.
#labels Specifications

= TOC =

 * [#Introduction Introduction]
 * [#Parameters Parameters]
 * [#Example Example]

= Introduction =

Creates build rules. Define compilers to be used for file types. Written in a file with the ending .xcbuildrules


= Parameters =

|| `Name` || string || Name  ||
|| `FileType` || string || Filetype identifier as defined in .[pbfilespec] ||
|| `CompilerSpec` || string || Compiler identifier as defined in a .[xcspec] ||


= Example =

{{{
(
	{
		Name = "Erlang source rule";
		FileType = "sourcecode.erlang.erl";
		CompilerSpec = "org.erlang.compiler.erlc";
	},
)
}}}
